fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: Choose all that apply. In case the HOS does not have the power to make important decisions on domestic policy, select 0 (None).
fxInfo_ordering: If you select 7, proceed to the next question [v2exctlhos]. If you select 0-6, skip to question "HOS dissolution in practice" [v2exdfdshs].
fxInfo_question: In practice, from which of the following bodies must the head of state customarily seek approval prior to making important decisions on domestic policy?

fxInfo_responses.value: The ruling party or party leadership body (in a one-party system). (0=No, 1=Yes)[v2exctlhs_2]

name: v2exctlhs
